name: Scuola di Preparazione Sociale
goal:
Promote citizenship, golden rule, human right in political dialogue with everybody.
We project experiences and laboratories to understand political rules and strategies to be inclusive, partecipative and democratic mainly in schools and with young people as main target.
interests: Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives:
Inclusion, promotion EU values, european citizenship, women inclusion and equity in representation and in public and private institution.
Regional development in labour inclusion, refugees integration, political movements, parties democracy, partecipative democracy through tools for including at the maximum every voice at local level for local decisions.
